imdb.plot outline: The Hip Hop Shop was a TV show that aired in Houston, Texas on Channel 55 and later The Kube 57 from 2010 to 2011. Hosted by recording artist Bobby Earth, The Hip Hop Shop featured rappers, dancers, and DJs. Almost every episode featured a segment called "The Weekly Callout" where dancers and sometimes dance crews would battle. Every episode featured a rap cypher at the end where rappers and singers would showcase their abilities. Some episodes featured interviews with guests such as Kendrick Lamar, Propain, Diggy Simmons and various local artists. Bobby Earth, Lita Styles and Cee-Won X have all gone on to have successful music recording careers.
imdb.title: The Hip Hop Shop

distributors.name: Find Me In The H TV

plot: _The Hip Hop Shop_ (qv) was a TV show that aired in Houston, Texas on Channel 55 and later The Kube 57 from 2010 to 2011. Hosted by recording artist Bobby Earth, _The Hip Hop Shop_ (qv) featured rappers, dancers, and DJs. Almost every episode featured a segment called "The Weekly Callout" where dancers and sometimes dance crews would battle. Every episode featured a rap cypher at the end where rappers and singers would showcase their abilities. Some episodes featured interviews with guests such as Kendrick Lamar, Propain, Diggy Simmons and various local artists. Bobby Earth, Lita Styles and Cee-Won X have all gone on to have successful music recording careers.
